text: Alice Drummond (May 21, 1928 - November 30, 2016) was an American actress of stage and television. She was known for her roles in Ghostbusters, Awakenings, To Wong Foo, Thanks for Everything! Julie Newmar, Ace Ventura: Pet Detective, and in Doubt. Drummond was born in Pawtucket, Rhode Island. She died on November 30, 2016 from complications of a fall in The Bronx, New York, aged 88.Alice Drummond, Character Actress, Dies at 88 ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1928 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Accidental deaths from falls in the United States Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:Actors from Rhode Island Category:People from Pawtucket, Rhode Island
title: Alice Drummond
